fix(ci): improve Raspberry Pi deployment reliability with pull retries and memory cleanup
Enhances the deploy-raspi.yml workflow to prevent OOM failures during Docker image pulls on low-memory Raspberry Pi devices.
Key improvements
Added retry mechanism for image pulling (3 attempts with status logging)
Added aggressive memory recovery steps between retries:
docker system prune -af
sync + drop kernel caches (echo 3 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches)
5-second cooldown
Updated pull command to explicitly use --platform linux/arm64 to avoid multi-arch manifest extraction
Improved logging for easier debugging of pull failures
These changes significantly reduce the chance of exit code 137 (OOM killed) during deployments and make Raspberry Pi deployments more resilient.
